articles.title: Android battery drain issues explained
articles.description: If the battery on your Android phone or tablet is draining more quickly than usual, try updating the Instagram app.

articles.title: Apple To Launch iOS 26, macOS 26 In Major Rebrand Tied To Software Redesigns
articles.description: The next Apple operating systems will be identified by year, rather than with a version number, according to people with knowledge of the matter. That means the current iOS 18 will give way to “iOS 26,” said the people, who asked not to be identified because the plan is still private. Other updates will be known as iPadOS 26, macOS 26, watchOS 26, tvOS 26 and visionOS 26.

articles.title: Gigantamax Rillaboom counters, weakness, and battle tips in Pokémon Go
articles.description: If you’re looking to take down Gigantamax Rillaboom in Pokémon Go, our guide lists its weakness, best counters, and general tips to help you out.

articles.title: Check out MST's 'ultimate' new Mk2 rally car
articles.description: Standard MST build not extreme enough? Try it with 350hp, Reiger suspension and a sequential 'box...

articles.title: Major study says malaria reinfection creates special immune cells
articles.description: Groundbreaking study reveals TR1 cells' crucial role in immune response to malaria, paving way for new vaccines and drugs.

articles.title: Software to meet advancing industry demands
articles.description: Minitab’s software solutions have evolved to increase product quality, get to market faster and reduce excess waste.

articles.title: Android Auto to gain video playback, games, web browsing
articles.description: Two highly requested features, video playback and web browsing, are "coming soon" to Android Auto – we just don't know how soon.

articles.title: Qualcomm study confirms Apple’s 5G chip is slower than its own
articles.description: Qualcomm commissioned an independent study that revealed, to no one's surprise, that its chips outperform Apple's 5G modem.

articles.title: Tech giants one-up each other in a weeklong AI news blitz
articles.description: From a new Google search to a devious Anthropic model, here are some highlights from a busy week in AI news.
